channel.title: Healthcare on The Encryption Compendium
channel.description: Recent content in Healthcare on The Encryption Compendium

item.title: Beyond Secrets: The Consumer Stake in the Encryption Debate
How Unvalidated Encryption Threatens Patient Data Security
item.description: Authors: HealthITSecurity Published: July 2016 URL: https://healthitsecurity.com/news/how-unvalidated-encryption-threatens-patient-data-security Abstract: Healthcare encryption methods can be greatly beneficial for organizations as they work to improve patient data security, but they must be used properly.

item.title: S.1842 - Protecting Personal Health Data Act
item.description: Authors: Klobuchar, Amy and Murkowski Published: June 2019 URL: https://www.congress.gov/bill/116th-congress/senate-bill/1842/text Abstract: To protect the personal health data of all Americans.
